div.p: We are wanting your input on how we can assist you all during this time of need. If you can please take the time to complete this survey it would be greatly appreciated. How can we help? survey. ...read more on How can we help?

div.h3: Special Thanks from the Reedsville School District!
div.p: We want to take the time to give recognition to the generous people and organizations in our area that have donated to our school district to help our students and families when they need it...read more on Special Thanks from the Reedsville School District!

div.h2: Welcome to Reedsville Public School District!
div.p:
For over a hundred years, the Reedsville Public School District has been helping students reach their potential. With exceptional student-centered programs, Reedsville Schools prides itself on “Helping Every Individual Learn!”
Our small school...
